channel.title: [317]WEBCLIENT ""<Variable>" error[317][Allstar/czar base]
channel.description:
hey i was following a tut on how to put up a webclient and i am having trouble with one spot. The error is in my client.java, something about a <variable> with the code [code]serverIP = "spades-scape.no-ip.biz";[/code] [URL=http://img35.imageshack.us/i/clienterr.png/][IMG]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/5403/clienterr.png[/img][/URL]
here's the compiler error [URL=http://img263.imageshack.us/i/cmderr.png/][IMG]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/1628/cmderr.png[/img][/URL] respond with haste please.
